thread.title: The "Kanye West Soap Opera" Stars Bryan Cranston, James Corden & More
thread.title_full: The "Kanye West Soap Opera" Stars Bryan Cranston, James Corden & More

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: The "Kanye West Soap Opera" Stars Bryan Cranston, James Corden & More
text:
For the latest star-studded Late Late Show sketch, The Bold and the Lyrical uses some Kanye West lyrics to create an incredible musical. Starring Bryan Cranston, James Corden, Jessica Biel, Reggie Watts and others, the "Kanye West Soap Opera" unfolds like a late-night version of the new Hamilton play. For every scenario and scene, the skit's stars have some Kanye West lyrics ready to deploy. However, Cranston does throw in a Drake bar to mix things up.
You can view the "Kanye West Soap Opera" spin on The Bold and the Lyrical above.
Read more at Hypebeast.com
